SARS Coronavirus 2 E Gene, Qualitative and Quantitative

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    94315-9 SARS-related coronavirus E gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection

    94758-0 SARS-related coronavirus E gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94765-5 SARS-related coronavirus E gene [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
